"Hero Class Aptitude Test III":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Hero Class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
By achieving the stated objective, even
further improvement is possible.

※Hero Class only
Defeat target enemies using
Swords, Twin Machineguns and Talises.
Lv.1+ enemies
※Hero's level cap increases to 70."
